name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The social selling chrome extension for LinkedIn

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily extract a list of people who engaged on a LinkedIn post in 1 click and get notifications about their activity to your inbox.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turn commenters on LinkedIn into potential clients with folk’s latest extension, LinkedIn Comments Exporter. Easily extract a list of people who have liked or commented on a specific LinkedIn post in just one click.

Mass outreach is so passé. Buyers expect customized experiences from the first touch—the numbers say it all. Advanced personalization is proven to 2x response rates but, for businesses, it can be prohibitively slow and manual process. Until now.

Our free tool enables you to export lists of relevant prospects and keep context about the post in a fraction of the time.

Here’s how it works:

1. Download the free tool and pin the extension to your browser
2. Browse LinkedIn for posts relevant to your business
3. When you find a post with potential prospects, click on “Export leads”
4. Receive the list of leads in CSV to your inbox

Looking to scale your outreach and grow your business? Upload your list to the folk CRM to enrich emails, automate messages, and track conversations. Find out more: https://app.folk.app/login
